title: Banned
body: During a game my internet crashed. I left the game but reconnected and was still banned once game finished

replies.body:
Hey Atafy NZ,

You have to keep the other players in the game in mind. A 4v5 match isn't too much fun for either side, especially yours. LeaverBuster is typically applied for five matches with a 20 minute buffer. Your account should be back to normal once these matches are played out.
